LanguageData.AteAkameMilk.label: Drank akame's almond milk
LanguageData.AteMikoWater.label: Drank miko's rice milk
LanguageData.AteYukiBreath.label: Drank yuki's liquid amber
LanguageData.AteYukiBreath.description: I feel stronger after just a sip of this!
LanguageData.AteSiroWine.label: Drank siro's wine
LanguageData.AteSiroWine.description: I feel off balance, but that was delicious!

LanguageData.AteKuroTea.description: I feel warm after drinking that.
LanguageData.AteAomeDrink.label: Drank aome's green sprout juice
